Index >  CopyToClipboard

CopyToClipboard()

Description

Copies the image of a specified index in buffer to clipboard in DIB format.

Syntax

.CopyToClipboard(sImageIndex);

Parameters

<short> sImageIndex: specifies the index of image in buffer. The index is 0-based.

Return value

bool

true indicates success. false indicates failure.

When false is returned, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

Remarks

CopyToClipboard() makes a copy of the image to the clipboard.

The copied image is in DIB format.

See also

CutToClipboard()
